prompts: Create a small, bipedal Pokemon with sleek black scales and a fiery red tail.
Imagine a cunning fire and poison-type Pokemon with unique dark features and agile movements.
Show me a Pokemon with a striking black and red color scheme, perfect for a stealthy hunter.
Design a small, agile Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, featuring fiery accents.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a dual-type fire and poison creature.
Make a creature that has a dynamic pose, showcasing its vibrant red tail and dark physique.
Give me a visually appealing Pokemon that combines elements of both fire and poison types.
